item.title: Academic: the website builder for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website in under 10 minutes.

I am second year PhD at the University of Waterloo under joint supervision of Prof. Greg Rice and Prof. Joel Dubin, who is the host of Health Data Science Lab (HDSL). This term, I also work for Prof. Martin Lysy at Statistical Consulting and Collaborative Research Unit (SCCRU). My other personal website hosted by UWaterloo server can be found here or click the stunning face emoji! Before arriving in Waterloo, I obtained MSc and BSc degrees at the University of Victoria supervised by Prof.
